title: how to change an email you dont have access to anymore
body:
does anyone know how to change the email address linked to the account that i no longer have access to?

when you go to the change email address section it sends a code to the old address.. anyone know how to bypass this?

i went to support but all i get is a pre-programed bot

replies.body: You may have been answered by Blitzbot, but there is an option to Request Human which will send you to one of our agents.  It may have also requested that you use our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which allows you to input an email you have access to.  Our account team would be the best venue, so we can update your account info manually from you.  See you there!

how do i request a human? as the acount recovery form doesn't let me submit it just keeps on the loading screen

The form getting stuck is odd, there might be an extension getting or the way or you may need to try clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  You can also reach out to us directly via email instead, via support@riotgames.com.
